comments_since_last_sample.body: You should be voting on any Bill, because you know they are stealing the money. All of the GOP need to go
America needs Biden's plan.  The rich don't like it because they are going to help pay for it.  And the Republicans don't like it because it makes them look bad.

Here's an approximate in terms of time of how long America has had carbon emissions vehicles. Count off 100 years which equates to how old earth is, now ready, count off one second. The one second equates to the time carbon emission vehicles have operated in America since the beginning of time. 100 years over one second. Now then I'm no genius, but I know during the industrialization period of England which was approximately 1829 many, many politicians, clergy, citizens of England thought that England faced one of the most destructive periods in her history. Others, though, thought and expressed an opinion that this period was the greatest period in the history of England.
Isn't their anything our constitution does to reverse This?
